00035     D3DTextureManager::D3DTextureManager(LPDIRECT3DDEVICE7 lpD3D)
00036         : TextureManager()

00038         mlpD3DDevice = lpD3D;
00039     }
00040     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     D3DTextureManager::~D3DTextureManager()
00042     {
00043         this->unloadAndDestroyAll();
00044     }
00045     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00046     Resource* D3DTextureManager::create( const String& name)
00047     {
00048         D3DTexture* t = new D3DTexture(name, mlpD3DDevice);
00049         t->enable32Bit(mIs32Bit);
00050         return t;
00051     }
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     void D3DTextureManager::unloadAndDestroyAll()
00054     {
00055         // Reimplement this to ensure deletion happens in same dll as creation
00056 
00057         // Unload & delete resources in turn
00058         for (ResourceMap::iterator i = mResources.begin(); i != mResources.end(); ++i)
00059         {
00060             i->second->unload();
00061             delete i->second;
00062         }
00063 
00064         // Empty the list
00065         mResources.clear();
00066     }
